title: Bad Idea
data:
- *You feel that [eating the little dog was a bad idea](/wiki/Aggravate_monster "Aggravate monster").*

Many things in [NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack") are a [Bad Idea](), although that often only becomes apparent after your demise, which may well be [YASD](/wiki/YASD "YASD").

A few Bad Ideas include:

- Using only the [arrow keys](/wiki/Movement_tactics#Diagonal_movement "Movement tactics").
- [Holding keys down](/wiki/Numeric_prefix "Numeric prefix").
- Letting monsters hit you for no good reason.
- [Genociding](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide") [@](/wiki/@ "@").
- Blessed-genociding [mind flayers](/wiki/Mind_flayer "Mind flayer") as a [dwarf](/wiki/Dwarf_\(starting_race\) "Dwarf (starting race)").
- Attempting to genocide while [confused](/wiki/Confused "Confused").
- Casting [force bolt](/wiki/Spellbook_of_force_bolt "Spellbook of force bolt") in potion shops.
- Casting [fireball](/wiki/Spellbook_of_fireball "Spellbook of fireball") in bookstores.
- Looting an [exploding box](/wiki/Container_trap "Container trap") in a tool shop.
- Shopping while [feeling jumpy](/wiki/Teleportitis#Shopping_with_uncontrolled_teleportitis "Teleportitis").
- Smashing open every [locked door](/wiki/Shop#Generation "Shop") in your way.
- [Pasting into the NetHack terminal](/wiki/Paste "Paste") without checking the clipboard.
- [Quaffing from every fountain](/wiki/Fountain#fountain_quaffing "Fountain") and risking [water moccasins](/wiki/Water_moccasin "Water moccasin") and [water demons](/wiki/Water_demon "Water demon") while at a low level in the hope of a [wish](/wiki/Wish "Wish").
- [Getting on your pony](/wiki/Knight#The_horse "Knight") right at the start of the game.
- [Eating](/wiki/Choking "Choking") "just one more" [giant](/wiki/Giant "Giant") or [lump of royal jelly](/wiki/Lump_of_royal_jelly "Lump of royal jelly").
- Eating [rotten corpses](/wiki/Food_poisoning "Food poisoning").
- Training [strength](/wiki/Strength "Strength") by [weight lifting](/wiki/Encumbrance#Stressed "Encumbrance").
- [Running around](/wiki/Pit "Pit") while [brandishing a cockatrice corpse](/wiki/Cockatrice#Wearing_gloves_while_wielding_the_corpse_as_a_weapon "Cockatrice").
- [Levitating around](/wiki/Sink "Sink") while brandishing a cockatrice corpse.
- [Groping around](/wiki/M "M") while [blind and bare-handed](/wiki/Cockatrice#Without_wearing_gloves.2C_blinded "Cockatrice").
- Leaving your [wand of wishing](/wiki/Wand_of_wishing "Wand of wishing") in your [main inventory](/wiki/Shock "Shock"), particularly before wishing for [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection").
- Kicking the box in the Castle that contains the [wand of wishing](/wiki/Glass "Glass") before removing the wand.
- Putting [all your wands](/wiki/Wand_of_cancellation "Wand of cancellation") or [all your tools](/wiki/Bag_of_tricks "Bag of tricks") into your [bag of holding](/wiki/Bag_of_holding "Bag of holding").
- Picking up nondescript [gray stones](/wiki/Loadstone "Loadstone").
- [Automatically picking up](/wiki/Autopickup "Autopickup") nondescript gray stones.
- Retreating to a [sanctuary](/wiki/Aligned_priest "Aligned priest") to test your [unidentified rings](/wiki/Ring_of_conflict "Ring of conflict").
- [Letting an altar convert *you*](/wiki/Sacrifice#altar_converts_you "Sacrifice").
- Treating [werecreatures](/wiki/Werecreatures "Werecreatures") very [inhumanely](/wiki/Sacrifice#Same-race_sacrifice "Sacrifice").
- Dipping for [Excalibur](/wiki/Excalibur "Excalibur") before checking your [experience level](/wiki/Experience_level "Experience level").
- As a [Samurai](/wiki/Samurai "Samurai"), dipping your [katana](/wiki/Katana "Katana") for [Excalibur](/wiki/Excalibur "Excalibur").
- [Engraving](/wiki/Elbereth "Elbereth") with the [wrong object](/wiki/Engraving#Speed "Engraving").
- Teleporting the other [Riders](/wiki/Riders "Riders") or their corpses.
- Hanging out next to a [drawbridge](/wiki/Drawbridge#Destruction "Drawbridge").
- Looting [bones](/wiki/Bones "Bones") files without [pickup\_burden](/wiki/Pickup_burden "Pickup burden").
- Killing a [nymph](/wiki/Mirror "Mirror") with a [force bolt](/wiki/Spellbook_of_force_bolt "Spellbook of force bolt").
- Throwing your metal [daggers](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger") at a [metallivore](/wiki/Metallivore "Metallivore").
- Throwing your [enchanted](/wiki/Enchantment "Enchantment") daggers at a [disenchanter](/wiki/Disenchanter "Disenchanter").
- [Disconnecting from the server](/wiki/Hangup "Hangup") while you decide what to [wish](/wiki/Wish "Wish") for.
- [Eating a tin](/wiki/Tin#Eating_a_tin "Tin") while wielding your [artifact weapon](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") in a shop.
- Editing wishes with the arrow keys in a terminal session. Your wish for an amulet of lifesaving may become a wish for a food ration.

## See also

- [Lessons learned the hard way](/wiki/Lessons_learned_the_hard_way "Lessons learned the hard way")
- [YASD](/wiki/YASD "YASD")
- [DeathOnAStick](/wiki/DeathOnAStick "DeathOnAStick")

Bad Idea

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
You feel that eating the little dog was a bad idea.

Many things in NetHack are a Bad Idea, although that often only becomes apparent after your demise, which may well be YASD.

A few Bad Ideas include:

  • Using only the arrow keys.
  • Holding keys down.
  • Letting monsters hit you for no good reason.
  • Genociding @.
  • Blessed-genociding mind flayers as a dwarf.
  • Attempting to genocide while confused.
  • Casting force bolt in potion shops.
  • Casting fireball in bookstores.
  • Looting an exploding box in a tool shop.
  • Shopping while feeling jumpy.
  • Smashing open every locked door in your way.
  • Pasting into the NetHack terminal without checking the clipboard.
  • Quaffing from every fountain and risking water moccasins and water demons while at a low level in the hope of a wish.
  • Getting on your pony right at the start of the game.
  • Eating "just one more" giant or lump of royal jelly.
  • Eating rotten corpses.
  • Training strength by weight lifting.
  • Running around while brandishing a cockatrice corpse.
  • Levitating around while brandishing a cockatrice corpse.
  • Groping around while blind and bare-handed.
  • Leaving your wand of wishing in your main inventory, particularly before wishing for reflection.
  • Kicking the box in the Castle that contains the wand of wishing before removing the wand.
  • Putting all your wands or all your tools into your bag of holding.
  • Picking up nondescript gray stones.
  • Automatically picking up nondescript gray stones.
  • Retreating to a sanctuary to test your unidentified rings.
  • Letting an altar convert you.
  • Treating werecreatures very inhumanely.
  • Dipping for Excalibur before checking your experience level.
  • As a Samurai, dipping your katana for Excalibur.
  • Engraving with the wrong object.
  • Teleporting the other Riders or their corpses.
  • Hanging out next to a drawbridge.
  • Looting bones files without pickup_burden.
  • Killing a nymph with a force bolt.
  • Throwing your metal daggers at a metallivore.
  • Throwing your enchanted daggers at a disenchanter.
  • Disconnecting from the server while you decide what to wish for.
  • Eating a tin while wielding your artifact weapon in a shop.
  • Editing wishes with the arrow keys in a terminal session. Your wish for an amulet of lifesaving may become a wish for a food ration.

See also

  • Lessons learned the hard way
  • YASD
  • DeathOnAStick
